 > I am looking for a book like "introduction to unit testing" any
> recommedations ? I have just read "Extreme Programming Explained" by
> Kent Beck which was an inspiring read and have used junit and jfunc a
> bit but need more guidance - if you know what I mean.

IMO the book mentioned in the subject line ("Unit Testing in Java") is a
good choice for you then. But I'm prejudiced, I'm the author.

Johannes
